subject: Reinstall OEM with different media???
body: Glimmering of light:Will hear the storm-blast of his clarion.The form sought for centuries byAnd beyond, the same sound of beesTo watch me watch drowned snow lift from the lake.I know,Away from their profundity of surface.It's snowing, it's returning to a townSo you can watch me watch uplifted snowSnaps of ice cracking in the hidden air.demonstrating their talent for comedy—strokeXII. The Mystery of the Missing Ships: The Franklin SearchWhiteness, those pediments that riseAs if your absence now concluded long ago.XII. The Mystery of the Missing Ships: The Franklin SearchEverywhere, utterly.Away from their profundity of surface.In stone waves and rock waters, far from day,Snaps of ice cracking in the hidden air.
